original_text: We must go now! We have already talked for too long. By now, we could have gone to Egypt and returned twice!’
korean_text: 우리가 지체하지 아니하였더라면 벌써 두 번 갔다 왔으리이다

sentences.original_text: We have already talked for too long.
we could have gone to Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 애굽에 갔다 왔을 수도 있습니다
그리고 두 번이나 돌아왔을 수도 있습니다!'
